text: Tyler Christopher Herro (born January 20, 2000) is an American professional basketball player for the Miami Heat of the National Basketball Association (NBA). After playing one year of college basketball for the Kentucky Wildcats, he was drafted by Miami in 2019. He was picked to the NBA All-Rookie Second Team in 2020. In his rookie season, Herro also reached the NBA Finals with the Heat. In 2022, he was named the NBA Sixth Man of the Year. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Miami Heat players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Wisconsin
title: Tyler Herro
